pages.text: The lumberjack will harvest trees in it's working area and deposit the dropped items into the specified chest.

pages.heading: Summoning
pages.ingredients: $(li)1x $(item)(Unstable) Otherworld Sapling $()$(li)1x $(item)Oak Sapling $()$(li)1x $(item)Birch Sapling $()$(li)1x $(item)Spruce Sapling $()$(li)1x $(item)Any Metal Axe $()
